manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: If you are looking for a sheer curtain that has some style, this is the curtain for you. The linen texture is fabulous and almost has a midcentury modern look to it. The fabric of voile curtains is soft and very nice quality. These sheer voile curtains are not the silky/shiny "sheers" but instead have a natural/woven texture and appearance. During the day they still let the sun through but it casts a lovely hue in the room compared to the blinds. they are light-filtering, not light-blocking. Helps to block the glare from the late-afternoon sun. You can still see out of them when they are closed but still gives you a certain amount of privacy. The sheerness of these curtains filters the light perfectly and blocks enough of the direct view into your living room from the street at night. Sheer curtains are very easy to install and make them a great addition to any room as you can create a designer look with little effort.

Style & Quality Sheers They are made of a nice woven material. The material is soft and drapes nicely.The linen texture is fabulous and almost has a midcentury modern look to it. They have more 'style'/texture then just a sheer. They look like a semi-sheer burlap almost. The linen pattern is just the right amount of sheer.The texture and design of these fit perfectly with just about any décor. Let curtains hang better and move nicely in a breeze.

The Right Balance of Privacy and Light It allows just the right amount of light in and brighten up your living room. These curtain panels are definitely sheer to let sunlight and fresh air through. They allow us to get quite a lot of beautiful light in our kitchen compared to the blinds. I love being able to see my garden through these during the day. But they are thick enough to provide a layer of privacy to block enough of the direct view into our living room from the street. We have blackout & thermal curtains for Summer. We also need these style sheer curtains for Spring - Fall.These are the ideal option between light-blocking curtains and traditional sheers.

Unique Home Décor & Simple Life Window Treatment Sheer Voile curtains give a light, romantic and airy look to a room by allowing sunlight to pass through the curtains. Perfect for my sun room nook for reading. You can paired these window curtains with a window scarf or go behind some room darkening drapes. Softens the windows, allows tons of light in, while providing a little bit of privacy.Sheer voile curtains with amazing texture are perfect for sunroom, dinning room, kitchen, bedroom, foyer, windows, doors, apt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect right out of the bag!!
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent semi sheer curtains. They were not wrinkled at all and the fabric is excellent! They are beautiful and appear to be very good quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These drapes are beautiful for a great price. I bought the 96 inch so it would go from ceiling to floor. It truly heightened the elegance and beauty of the room. I like them so much. I also put them in the living room. I have three sets hanging in the dining room, Photo, and I’m likely going to buy two more because I like the fuller look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these so much we have six sets!
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are beautiful! We have them in three different rooms and they really brighten up the space!They are not light blocking but rather light filtering. If you have a really sunny spot or need some privacy I would think these would be perfect for your space! I’m not sure I would use them in a bedroom or any place that you really want to block out the light though!The material is thin and very breezy and the grommets make them super easy to open and close!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Off White Linen Panels
reviews.reviewText: Love the off white color! excellent quality and lovely texture. Also, love the bronze grommets!!! Easy to hang. Hung them at night, and could not see into my home from the outside. I paired them with velvet navy curtains and it totally transformed the space. So happy! Will buy more to redo my living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice curtains
reviews.reviewText: These curtains look great. We have light filtering pleated shades behind the curtains, so it still lets in a lot of light. If you are wanting less light, you would need to get blackout shades or cellular shades to use with these curtains, otherwise if will still be very bright. This is exactly what we wanted, so it is perfect and looks really nice. They were very easy to iron and hang well with a little deliberate placement. Great curtains for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent light filtering curtains WITH bronze grommets!
reviews.reviewText: I searched Amazon for hours to find light-filtering curtains made with a linen material, and non-silver grommets. No easy task! I was happy to find these panels and ordered them in “Natural” right away for 3 windows in my formal living room. For the largest window (pictured), I paired them with “stone-blue” colored panels from another brand—also linen and with bronze grommets! Winning!!! This “Natural” color is just perfect. It’s really hard to choose between beige, white, ivory, cream, natural, etc., when shopping for curtains! But I’m very happy with how these look. They are “warm” toned and go well with my home decor elements and even my wall paint (Putnam Ivory—Benjamin Moore). They are sheer enough that my beautiful yard won’t be blocked from sight, but they offer a bit of privacy. This window will eventually have 4 of these panels going all the way across the middle, and will be framed by the blue curtains on the swing-out rods at the sides. I’m just waiting on the curtain rod that I ordered! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sheers
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased a number of these curtains. We like the weight of the sheets and the texture. I have them on our patio door as well as living room windows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great curtains for the cost!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two sets of 2 for living room window. Privacy was not a big issue, so these are perfect & I love the weave pattern. I think I will order another set to increase fullness.
Un poco larga tuve que ajustar el tamaño

I bought two pairs of these curtains for my den which has southwest and west windows. The curtains are accurately described by the seller as light filtering. I didn't want the light totally blocked out so I am very pleased with the curtains. The fabric is not shinny and I like that too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good linen quality, nice fall and look very classy. Arrived before time too

bought these for my sunroom, to deflect some heat and make it homey looking. the sheerness/non sheerness it awesome, I can see thru but its not totally sheer. the material is very nice, they don't look cheap at all. very happy with these curtains.
